entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
